'''1.8.1''' was a server version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on June 20, 2009, at 21:04 UTC.<ref name="release">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P4:04:49 <Notch> try now, new minecraft-server.zip''" (21:04:49 UTC)</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a protocol error leading to players not being able to connect to servers.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P4:04:06 <C418> well I can't connect to your server''" [...] "''P4:04:15 <Rroff|afk> I can't connect to my server either''" [...] "''P4:04:49 <Notch> try now, new minecraft-server.zip''" [...] "''P4:06:37 <Miclee> Notch, your test server works.''" (21:04 to 21:06 UTC)</ref>
